descriptionSet.description: On this advertisement for Lion Brand Chrystallised Fruits, a blonde white woman can be seen in the left section of the image with box of the advertised product and a piece of chrystallised fruit in her hands. The center of the image hosts a detailed of the product. On the right, the logo of the Earl of Wellington is pictured as well as a list of further products as well as more samples and a lion painted on a blue background.

inscription.text: H.G. Chrystallized fruits are made from the pick of India's fruit crops, by experts in the art of chrystallising. They retain, to an amazing degree, the natural succulence and flavour of the fruit and are, for this reason, equally popular among young and old. A jar of H.G. "Lion Brand" fruits at your X'mas party will very soon prove their popularity to you! Be wise - have more supplies of H.G. products ready to cope with the rush! Obtainable everywhere.
HG Lion Brand Chrystallized Fruits Harnarain Gopinath Head Office & Works: Khari Baoli, Delhi Phone No. 6318. Branch & Shop Romm: Baird Road, New Delhi Phone No. 2044 Telegrams: -"Murabba"

By appointment to H.E. the Earl of Wellington The largest manufacturers in India of Chrystallised Fruits, candies Peels, cut Peels, Pickles, Preserves, Chutneys, Ram Ban Churan, Sharbats, Hair Oils and a variety of tasty and beneficial compounds. Trade Mark

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

titleSet.title: An advertisement of Lion Brand Crystallised Fruits

description-en: On this advertisement for Lion Brand Chrystallised Fruits, a blonde white woman can be seen in the left section of the image with box of the advertised product and a piece of chrystallised fruit in her hands. The center of the image hosts a detailed description of the product. On the right, the logo of the Earl of Wellington is pictured as well as a list of further products as well as more samples and a lion painted on a blue background. (gs)
